channel.title: Winter Tag on Nathan's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Winter on Nathan's Site

item.title: The Prep Run
item.description:
Today was prep day. In a few weeks, I’ll be flying out to ski in the rockies. So I needed to do a warm up run.

It was about 23F1 at Whitetail Resort. Not my preferred skiing temperature2 but it was good enough. This being the east coast, there wasn’t any snow, it was all ice. The ice coast.

The big “snow” guns you see in the photos, don’t make snow. They make small things of ice. And they are not fun3 to ski in front of.

My friend who lives in Denver, told me to get plenty of turns in. I think I did, but I’ll find out in the morning.

item.title: First Snow
item.description:
It’s that time of the year. Time to crash your car off the road!

Snow is falling in my neck of Maryland now. And while it looks nice, people don’t know how to drive in it. Even though it snows every year here.

It also doesn’t help that the county roads haven’t been salted yet. The state highways are fine. Just not the neighborhood roads. Getting home from work was easy, till I got off the highway.

Looking at the weather for the next week. The snow will probably hang around. Most here will hate that, but I love it. I’ve always loved the look of a snow filled sky, and covered ground.

I also want it to stay, because I need to get skiing. My trip to Colorado is coming up soon, and I need to get in shape for those tall boi mountains. Subscribe to my RSS feed for that, as I’ll be posting during the trip. You can also subscribe to just the Denver 2024 tag if you want.
